XXrabhramu:2_0: iha bhāvanādhikṛto mantrī prātar utthāya hṛdayārkanyastanijabījaḥ kṛtamukhaśaucādiḥ
XXrabhramu:3_0: oṃ rakṣa rakṣa hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā
XXrabhramu:4_0: iti sthānātmayogarakṣāṃ kṛtvā gandhapuṣpādisurabhitāṃ dhyānabhūmiṃ praviśya,
XXrabhramu:4_1: sukhāsane paryaṅkam ābhujya, arghaṃ parijapya, hṛnmantrakiraṇākṛṣṭam abhimukham ākāśe saparivāraṃ bhagavantam avalokya,
XXrabhramu:4_4: caurī raviṃ, vettālī jalam, ghasmarī palalam, pukkasī candanam, śabarī madhu, caṇḍālī ḍamarukaṃ vādayati, ḍombī kaṇṭhalagnā puruṣāyate.
XXrabhramu:4_5: tatas tasyaiva bhagavato 'grataḥ pāpadeśanādikam iti kuryāt -
XXrabhramu:5_1: sarvam ātmanaḥ pāpaṃ bhagavataḥ purataḥ pratideśayāmi,
XXrabhramu:5_3: sarvaṃ cātmanaḥ kuśalam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayāmi.
XXrabhramu:5_4: eṣo 'ham ā bodher buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dvipadānām agryam.
XXrabhramu:5_7: aho batāham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ abhisaṃbudheya sarvasattvānām arthāya hitāya sukhāya yāvad atyantaniṣṭhe nirvāṇe buddhabodhau pratiṣṭhāpanāya.
XXrabhramu:5_8: eṣo 'ham anuttaraṃ bodhimārgam āśrayāmi yad uta vajrayānam.
XXrabhramu:6_4: tataḥ sarvadharmān manasālambya vicārayet ḥ cittam evaitat tena tenākāreṇa bhrāntaṃ pratibhāsate yathāsvapne.
XXrabhramu:7_2: grāhyābhāvāc cittam api grāhakaṃ na bhavati.
XXrabhramu:7_5: evam ekāntena niścitya bhrāntisamāropitaṃ bhrānticihnaṃ sarvadharmāṇām ākāraṃ vihāya teṣāṃ prakṛtim eva kevalām advayavijñaptilakṣaṇāṃ śuddhasphaṭikasaṃkāśāṃ śaradamalamadhyāhnagaganopamām anantāṃ paśyet.
XXrabhramu:7_6: idam ucyate pāramārthikaṃ bodhicittaṃ lokottaraṃ śūnyatājñānaṃ niṣprapañcaṃ nirvikalpam.
XXrabhramu:9_0: saiva bhagavatī prajñāpāramitā, saiva paramā rakṣā.
XXrabhramu:10_0: tatas tanniṣyandabhūtām ākāravatīṃ rakṣāṃ śuddhalaukikajñānasvabhāvāṃ bhāvayet.
XXrabhramu:11_0: repheṇa sūryaṃ purato vibhāvya tasmin ravau hūṃbhavaviśvavajram /
XXrabhramu:11_1: tenaiva vajreṇa vibhāvayec ca prākārakaṃ pañjarabandhanaṃ ca //
XXrabhramu:12_0: viśvavajrakiraṇaiḥ pralayānaladuḥsahaiḥ sarvataḥ spharitvā [BhrHe_160] ghanībhūya racitaṃ tiryak caturasraṃjvaladvajraprākāram,
XXrabhramu:12_1: upariṣṭād vajrapañjaram, adhastād vajramayīṃ bhūmim ārasātalaviracitāṃ paśyet.
XXrabhramu:12_2: tato raviviśvavajrābhyāṃ raśmībhūya diśi diśi spharitvā ghanībhūya bahir dūre sīmābandhaḥ karaṇīya iti ślokārthaḥ.
XXrabhramu:13_0: tatas tanniṣyandatayaiva viśuddhāni pañca mahābhūtāni cintayet.
XXrabhramu:13_1: tatrākāśamahābhūtaṃ dharmodayākhyaṃ mahāvajradharasvabhāvaṃ śaracchaśadharadhavalam adhaḥ sūkṣmam upari viśālaṃ trikoṇam antar gaganasvarūpaṃ abhyantarodgataviśvadaIakamalakarṇikāvasthitavipulaviśvavajram.
XXrabhramu:13_2: tadvedikāyāṃ catvāri mahābhūtāni caturmaṇḍalākārāṇi caturdevīsvabhāvāny upary upari paśyet.
XXrabhramu:13_3: ādau laṃkāreṇa māhendramaṇḍalaṃ caturasraṃ pītaṃ koṇeṣu triśūkavajrāṅkam.
XXrabhramu:13_4: tato vaṃkāreṇa vāruṇaṃ vartulaṃ sitaṃ ghaṭāṅkam.
XXrabhramu:13_5: tato raṃkāreṇāgneyaṃ trikoṇaṃ raktaṃ koṇeṣu rephāṅkam.
XXrabhramu:13_6: tato yaṃkāreṇa vāyavyaṃ dhanurākāraṃ kṛṣṇaṃ koṭidvaye calatpatākāṅkam.
XXrabhramu:13_7: bhāvakas tu tadānīṃ tad eva lokottarajñānaṃ [BhrHe_161] vyāpakatvena sthitam.
XXrabhramu:13_8: tato viśvavajravedikāmadhye caturmahābhūtapariṇāmajaṃ pariśuddhabuddhakṣetrasaṃkṣeparūpaṃ mahāmokṣapuraṃ vairocanasvabhāvaṃ nānāratnamayaṃ kūṭāgāram aṣṭābhiḥ śmaśānaiḥ sarvalokadhātunairātmyasūcakaiḥ parivṛtaṃ dhyāyāt.
XXrabhramu:14_5: paramaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmair upahāraiś ca harṣaṇam //
XXrabhramu:15_0: tatra madhyāsanasyopari pañcadaśabhiḥ svaraiś candramaṇḍalam ādarśajñānasvabhāvam,
XXrabhramu:15_2: tanmadhye aṃkārahūṃkārapariṇatau [BhrHe_162] karttikapālau saṃyuktau svabījamadhyagatau pratyavekṣaṇājñānātmakau cintayet.
XXrabhramu:15_4: tān saṃhṛtya, taiḥ sahaikīkṛtaṃ bījaṃ kṛtyānuṣṭhānajñānam,
XXrabhramu:15_5: tataś candrasūryacihnabījapariṇāmajaṃ bhagavantaṃ vajrasattvaṃ vakṣyamāṇavarṇākṛticihnādinā śrīherukarūpeṇāvirbhūtaṃ tathaiva nairātmyāśliṣṭakandharaṃ suviśuddhadharmadhātujñānātmakaṃ paśyet.
XXrabhramu:16_1: jvalad bījadvayaṃ rāgāt padmāntaḥ praviśad dravet //
XXrabhramu:16_2: tato vajrī mahārāgād vilīya saha vidyayā /
XXrabhramu:16_6: uṭṭha bharāḍo karuṇamaṇu pukkasi mahuṃ paritāhi /
XXrabhramu:16_9: tojjha vihuṇṇe marami haüṃ uṭṭhahi tuhuṃ hevajja /
XXrabhramu:16_11: loa nimantia suraapahu suṇṇe acchasi kīsa /
XXrabhramu:16_12: haüṃ caṇḍālī viṇṇamami taï viṇu uhami na dīsa //
XXrabhramu:16_13: indīālī uṭṭha tuhuṃ haüṃ jāṇami tuhu citta /
XXrabhramu:16_14: aṃhe ḍombī cchea maṇu mā karu karuṇavicchitta //
XXrabhramu:17_0: atha gītikānurodhāc candradravasaṃhārajābhyāṃ tatkālajaravimaṇḍalasthitābhyām aṃkārahūṃkārābhyāṃ devatānāṃ cihnadehādikam ākāśopamaṃ māyopamaṃ ca niścitya,
XXrabhramu:17_1: tatpariṇāmayoḥ karttikapālayoḥ saṃyuktayor dṛḍhasamādhirūpayor garbhe tad eva
XXrabhramu:17_3: tata eva spharaṇayogena yoginīcakrākārānantatathāgatamayaṃ cittādhīnaṃ ca viśvaṃ nirūpya saṃharaṇayogena sarvaṃ tan māyopamaṃ gaganopamaṃ ca parijñāya dvitīyaravicihnabījapariṇāmajaṃ śrīherukam ātmānaṃ paśyet.
XXrabhramu:18_14: cakrī kuṇḍala kaṇṭhā ca haste rucaka mekhalam //
XXrabhramu:18_17: pṛthivī varuṇa vāyuś ca tejaś candrārka eva ca /
XXrabhramu:19_2: tato 'sya śrotre nairātmyām, cakṣuṣi vajrām, ghrāṇe guhyagaurīm, [BhrHe_167] jihvāyāṃ vāriyoginīm,
XXrabhramu:19_6: rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmāyataneṣu bāhyagaurī caurī vettālī ghasmarī bhūcarī khecarī,
XXrabhramu:19_9: māṃse pukkasī, rudhire śabarī, śukre caṇḍālī, majjamedayor ḍombī, carmaṇi sapta bodhyaṅgāni, asthiṣu satyacatuṣṭayam. evaṃ devatābhiḥ sakalīkṛtya tadaparāḥ śuddhīr adhimuñcet.
XXrabhramu:20_2: mukhāny aṣṭau vimokṣās tu tribhis tattvais trilocanaḥ /
XXrabhramu:20_3: pañca mudrā jināḥ pañca kruddho duṣṭānuśāsanam //
XXrabhramu:21_0: tadanu svahṛdbījaraśmispharaṇāṅkuśair daśadiggatāṃs tathāgatān ākṛṣya nabhasi saṃsthāpya tān aṣṭamātṛbhiḥ saṃpūjya
XXrabhramu:23_0: iti prārthayet. taiḥ śrīherukarūpāpannaiḥ pañcāmṛtabhṛtapañcatathāgatātmakaiḥ kalaśair abhiṣicyate.
XXrabhramu:23_3: dundubhiśabdaś ca śrūyate, rūpavajrādibhiḥ saṃpūjyate, vajragītyā locanādibhiḥ stūyate.
XXrabhramu:24_0: ity ādiyogo nāma samādhiḥ, svābhāvikaś ca kāyaḥ.
XXrabhramu:26_1: caturānandabhāg viśva hūṃ hūṃ kāryaṃ kuruṣva me //
XXrabhramu:28_1: khagamukhaikaraso nātha hūṃ hūṃ kāryaṃ kuruṣva me //
XXrabhramu:31_0: iti ratim ārabhet. tataḥ kamalodarapatitacandradravabindupariṇāmena gaṃkāreṇa niṣpannāṃ gaurīṃ kṛṣṇavarṇāṃ karttirohitadharāṃ pūrvadvārāsanacandre cintayet.
XXrabhramu:31_1: tathā caṃkāreṇa caurīṃ māñjiṣṭhavarṇāṃ kṛpīṭaśūkaradharāṃ dakṣiṇadvārāsanacandre,
XXrabhramu:31_2: tathā vaṃkāreṇa vettālīṃ kanakavarṇāṃ kūrmakapāladharāṃ paścimadvārāsanacandre,
XXrabhramu:31_5: tathā paṃkāreṇa pukkasīm indranīlanibhāṃ keśariparśudharāṃ aiśānakoṇāsanacandre,
XXrabhramu:31_6: tathā śaṃkāreṇa śabarīṃ candrakāntanibhāṃ bhikṣukhikkhirikādharām āgneyakoṇāsanacandre,
XXrabhramu:32_0: tathā laṃkāreṇa caṇḍālīṃ nabhaḥśyāmāṃ cakralāṅgaladharāṃ naiṛtikoṇāsanacandre,
XXrabhramu:32_1: tathā ḍaṃkāreṇa ḍombīṃ karburavarṇāṃ vajratarjanikādharāṃ vāyavyakoṇāsanacandre dhyāyāt.
XXrabhramu:34_0: atha parito niṣpannaṃ maṇḍalam avalokya hṛdbījakiraṇāṅkuśair jñānamaṇḍalam ākṛṣya,
XXrabhramu:36_2: hṛnmantrakiraṇaiḥ sarvatathāgatān ākṛṣya saṃpūjya prārthya tayor abhiṣekaṃ dāpayet.
XXrabhramu:37_0: pukkasyādyāś catasras tu gauryādyāś ca yathākramam /
XXrabhramu:39_2: teṣāṃ kāyādīnāṃ yā dharmatā vijñaptimātratā dvayaśūnyatā tasyāḥ pratyavekṣaṇaṃ yathāyogaṃ dvārapālīnāṃ tattvam.
XXrabhramu:39_3: tasyā eva śūnyatāyāḥ samyagjñānaṃ niṣprapañcam anāsravā prajñā vajrayānam anuttaraṃ yathāyogaṃ pukkasyādīnāṃ catasṛṇāṃ tattvam.
XXrabhramu:39_4: tasyaiva vajrayānasya phalaṃ mahāvajradharapadaṃ niruttarā bodhir maṇḍalādhipates tattvam.
XXrabhramu:40_0: tataḥ svahṛdbījād aṣṭau pūjādevīḥ saṃsphārya tāsāṃ spharaṇameghair gaganam āpūrya sanāyakaṃ maṇḍalaṃ pūjayet.
XXrabhramu:40_1: tato māyopamān sarvadharmān adhimucya gītidvayena bhagavantaṃ stūyāt.
XXrabhramu:42_4: tena teṣāṃ tāpanam, pākād dravīkṛtya jñānasūryīkaraṇād dyotanam,
XXrabhramu:42_6: tajjñānabījebhyas tair eva kiraṇair ākṛṣya jñānāmṛtaṃ teṣu saṃpātya samarasīkuryāt.
XXrabhramu:42_7: evaṃ tāny amṛtīkṛtya tryakṣareṇādhiṣṭhāya hūṃkāreṇa jihvāyāṃ śubhravajram,
XXrabhramu:42_9: tair amṛtair ātmānaṃ maṇḍalaṃ ca saṃtarpayet.
XXrabhramu:43_0: mātṛcakre pure ramye bhāvayed īdṛśaṃ prabhum /
XXrabhramu:44_1: iti maṇḍalarājāgrī nāma dvitīyaḥ samādhiḥ, sāṃbhogikaś ca kāyaḥ.
XXrabhramu:45_0: tato gaurīṃ caurīṃ yāvan maṇḍalādhipatiṃ pratyekam anupūrvyā daśasu dikṣu nirantaraṃ saṃsphārya,
XXrabhramu:45_1: sattvānām arthaṃ kṛtvā, teṣv eva saṃhṛtya, kṛtakṛtyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ maṇḍalādhipatiṃ ca niṣprapañcasukhasamarpitaṃ paśyet.
XXrabhramu:45_2: tatra gaurī kāyasya bhūtapratyavekṣāyāṃ sattvān vyavasthāpayati,
XXrabhramu:45_3: caurī cittasya, vettālī vācaḥ, ghasmarī jñānasya, pukkasī kāyasya samyagjñāne, śabarī cittasya, caṇḍālī vācaḥ, ḍombī jñānasya. maṇḍaleśvaras tu mahāvajradharapade sattvān avasthāpayati.
XXrabhramu:47_0: kṛṣṇaṃ raktaṃ tataḥ pītaṃ harin nīlaṃ sitaṃ kramāt /
XXrabhramu:48_2: bhāvanākhinno mantraṃ japet. samaṇḍalam ātmānaṃ devatārūpeṇāvirbhūtaṃ vicintya
XXrabhramu:49_0: oṃ deva picuvajra hūṃ 3 phaṭ svāhā
XXrabhramu:50_0: iti hṛtsūrye trayodaśa mantrākṣarāṇy ūrdhvaśiraskāni pradīpavaj jvalanti maṇḍalībhūtāni manasābhilikhya,
XXrabhramu:50_1: tāny eva vācayan vajravācā krodhavācā vā japet.
XXrabhramu:50_2: sarvamukhebhyaḥ sarvadevīmukhebhyaś ca mantram uccarantam adhimuñcet.
XXrabhramu:50_3: iyataiva svadevatāyā aṣṭaguṇo jāpaḥ sarvadevīnāṃ ca mantrajāpaḥ kṛto bhavati.
XXrabhramu:52_1: ebhir labheya kuśalair lambhayeyaṃ ca taj jagat //
XXrabhramu:52_2: caryā saṃbodhaye yā ca saṃbuddhānāṃ ca yā punaḥ /
XXrabhramu:52_3: varṇitā bodhivajreṇa sā caryāstu dvayī mama //
XXrabhramu:53_5: madhyāhnapradoṣasandhyayor dhyānagṛhaṃ praviśya pūrvavad ādhāramaṇḍalaṃ tanmadhyāsane cātmānaṃ samāpannāṣṭānanahevajrarūpaṃ jhaṭiti dṛṣṭvā,
XXrabhramu:53_13: tāni dṛṣṭvā yathātantram abhimatasiddher upāyam anutiṣṭhed iti.
XXrabhramu:55_1: kuśalam idam avāptaṃ yan mayā janmabhājāṃ niravadhihitahetus tena vajrī jinaḥ syām //
